comment.author: 87910178@N05
comment._content: View from The Pensioners  Barracks (British Pensioner Guards/old soldiers  sent out to accompany British convicts from 1850-1868). The South Perth foreshore is in the background, Mt Eliza and Kings Park are to the right. Now the Narrows Bridge built in the 1960's links South Perth to Mounts Bay Road at the base of Mt Eliza.
